    • org.fcrepo.auth.oauth.filter.OAuthFilterTest

extends Object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp() 
      void testBadAuthorizationHeader()
      The token-bearing header is expected to be of the format Authorization : Bearer $TOKEN Our OAuth library sends no elaborating error type back in this circumstance, resulting in a generic 401 (Unauthorized)
      void testMissingAuthorizationHeader()
      The token-bearing header is must be present for a default configuration.
      void testMultipleStyles()
      A misconfigured filter that attempts to parse tokens in multiple ways is treated as an invalid request by our OAuth library, and should result in a 400 (Bad Request)
      void testNoStyles()
      A misconfigured filter that has no token parsing strategies is treated as an invalid request by our OAuth library, and should result in a 400 (Bad Request)
      void testValidRequest()

      • testBadAuthorizationHeader

        public void testBadAuthorizationHeader()
                                throws IOException,
                                       javax.servlet.ServletException
        The token-bearing header is expected to be of the format Authorization : Bearer $TOKEN Our OAuth library sends no elaborating error type back in this circumstance, resulting in a generic 401 (Unauthorized)
        Throws:
        IOException
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • testMissingAuthorizationHeader

        public void testMissingAuthorizationHeader()
                                    throws IOException,
                                           javax.servlet.ServletException
        The token-bearing header is must be present for a default configuration. Our OAuth library sends no elaborating error type back when it is missing, resulting in a generic 401 (Unauthorized)
        Throws:
        IOException
        javax.servlet.ServletException
